### hasAtLeastLocalUnnamedAddr() {#a25d7dd8317de8297642fb8d981ca87f8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::sandboxir::GlobalValue::hasAtLeastLocalUnnamedAddr () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if this value&#39;s address is not significant in this module.

This attribute is intended to be used only by the code generator and LTO to allow the linker to decide whether the global needs to be in the symbol table. It should probably not be used in optimizations, as the value may have uses outside the module; use <a href="#a967748a3bf1884f4cd4eba8fc60ca1f0">hasGlobalUnnamedAddr()</a> instead.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/constant-h/#l00630">630</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/constant-h">Constant.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
